SEARCH
Package it.unipv.ingsfw.JavaBeats.dao.playable

Interface IAudioDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioDAO
public interface IAudioDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for managing operations related to the JBAudio entity in the database. This interface provides methods to perform Insert, Remove, Get operations on Song and Episode records. It also allows to select JBAudio by their JBCollection and to perform special operations for the Favorites Playlist and the User Listening History.
See Also:
  • JBAudio
  • Song
  • Episode
  • JBCollection

  • Method Details

    • insert

      void insert(JBAudio audio) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Inserts a new JBAudio record in the database.
      Parameters:
      audio - audio to add
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException

    • remove

      void remove(JBAudio audio)
      Removes a JBAudio record from the database.
      Parameters:
      audio - audio to delete

    • get

      JBAudio get(JBAudio audio, JBProfile activeProfile) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Retrieves the complete information regarding a specific JBAudio record from the database. Note that it will return a result specific for the user requesting it.
      Parameters:
      audio - audio to get
      activeProfile - current active profile
      Returns:
      audio with complete and updated info
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException

    • updateIsFavorite

      void updateIsFavorite(JBProfile activeProfile) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Updates the Favorites playlist associated with a JBProfile. Note that it will behave differently based on the user requesting it.
      Parameters:
      activeProfile - current active profile
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException

    • addToListeningHistory

      void addToListeningHistory(JBAudio audio, JBProfile activeProfile)
      Marks a specific JBAudio as listened in the database. The database will store the audio id, the mail of the listener and the timestamps at which the method is executed. Note that it will behave differently based on the user requesting it.
      Parameters:
      audio - audio to add to listening history
      activeProfile - listener

    • selectByPlaylist

      ArrayList<JBAudio> selectByPlaylist(Playlist playlist, JBProfile activeProfile) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Retrieves all JBAudio from a specific Playlist from the database. Note that it will return a different result based on the user requesting it.
      Parameters:
      playlist - collection from which to recover the audios
      activeProfile - current active profile
      Returns:
      audios as an ArrayList of JBAudio
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException

    • selectByAlbum

      ArrayList<Song> selectByAlbum(Album album, JBProfile activeProfile) throws AccountNotFoundException
      Retrieves all Song from a specific Album from the database. Note that it will return a different result based on the user requesting it.
      Parameters:
      album - collection from which to recover the audios
      activeProfile - current active profile
      Returns:
      audios as an ArrayList of Song
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException
